title: Amy’s Son Wants To Carry Gun With His Halloween Costume + Finish The 90’s Country Lyric Game + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should He Tell His Girlfriend About His Debt?
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Wants To Carry Gun With His Halloween Costume + Finish The 90’s Country Lyric Game + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should He Tell His Girlfriend About His Debt?
description:
Amy’s son is going to be a SWAT team member for Halloween and wants to carry a gun with his costume. We debate whether it’s a good idea or not. We play “Finish The Lyric” 90’s edition. Bobby opens up the mailbag from a listener who wants to know if he needs to tell his girlfriend about his debt before moving in together.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
